plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lower-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lower-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d upper-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 upper-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numerical digits.
Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d special symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 special symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.

plurals.name: lenovo_kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect %1$s PIN code; you have %2$d remaining attempt/s.
Incorrect %1$s PIN code; you have %2$d remaining attempt/s before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: lenovo_kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect %1$s PUK code; you have %2$d remaining attempt/s before %1$s becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect %1$s PUK code; you have %2$d remaining attempt/s before %1$s becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code; you have %d remaining attempt/s.
Incorrect SIM PIN code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before SIM becomes permanently unusable.
